Does software escrow have to be this hard?

Codekeeper was founded by people from the tech industry to bring escrow into the cloud era and make it easy for software developer and software clients.

Everything is still manual?

Traditional escrows require expensive manual deposits at extra costs, and they take long to process.

Time consuming manual deposits

Complex deposit procedures

Expensive lawyer driven process

No certain path to recovery?

Old school escrow solutions aren’t prepared for the requirements of the real-time SaaS cloud era.

Outdated and incomplete deposit versions

Deployment configuration information is missing

No team available to redeploy quickly

You are losing out if you're spending lots of time and money on a solution that lets your team down when they need it most.

Let us show you a different way!
